resources.string: There are no events here :/\nTry clicking the bookmark button on the bottom right.
If you want to learn about Android dev, go to his Android Development Workshop @ HackCWRU! Also, you can find him at brianvli.com

If you liked the Countdown Page, you should also check out his awesome Android app \"The Jump Rope Tricktionary\". \n\nFun fact: Dylan is a pro jump roper (you should ask him to show you his skills!!).
If you liked the maps or the nicely formatted time, you should check out Anna at https://www.annasedlackova.com. \n\nFun fact: Anna builds rockets in her free time (she\'s a serious badass!!)
